body: ok added it. On a side note: We should consider enforcing correctness of these comments by a linter or, maybe actually better, removing this practice. The namespace refactoring we're planning to do in the future will break a lot of these if they aren't checked, and wrong comments are worse than no comments. Also, I'm not sure how useful these actually are.
